full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Universal Testing Machine**
**Publication Date**: 2024-01-08
**Deadline for Submission**: 2024-02-17 14:00:00

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement
**Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Description**: Natural Resources Canada is seeking a supplier to provide a Universal Testing Machine (UTM) and associated accessories. The machine will be used for testing the crushing strength of iron ore pellets. The procurement is restricted to holders of the Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI.

**Specifications**: The UTM must meet or exceed the minimum specifications outlined in the Statement of Requirements and in accordance with the mandatory evaluation criteria.

**Contact Information**: For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

Vincent Gariépy
Natural Resources Canada
email: vincent.gariepy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
phone: (819) 239-9895
address: 212 Place de la Cité, Suite 50, Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada

**Attachments**: The tender notice and documents are available at the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28910/notice-of-proposed-procurement-nrcan-5000078813_0.pdf. Only authorized personnel may access these documents.

**Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
